ing: 1 (4 ounce) can chipotle peppers, drained and rinsed
des: "Vodka with a pepper spice and flavor. Great in a bloody mary! The darker the color, the spicier the vodka."
ins: Pour vodka into a pitcher with a lid. Wrap peppers in a clean cotton cloth to dry; add to vodka. Allow to sit until vodka changes color, at least 2 hours.
